flawed_nl_solution:
The medical cost comes out to 45*10+250=$<<45*10+250=700>>700
Insurance covers 700*0.8=$<<700*0.8=650>>650
So he has to pay 700-650=$<<700-650=50>>50
Added to the cost of the trip he has to pay 1200+50=$<<1200+50=1250>>1250
#### 1250

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 560, not 650. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
